attributes.action: Maintain HIFU treatment for Prostate cancer suffers on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Institute for Health and Clinical Excellence is to change its guidance on HIFU to make it all-but-impossible to continue to access this on the NHS. I call on the government maintain the availability of HIFU treatment on the NHS and so retain a choice of a treatment which is non-invasive and has fewer side effects that conventional treatments for prostate cancer.
